items.question: What is the meaning of:
items.answer: Jai Bhim: Victory to Bhim, slogan used by Indian social reformer Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkartribal certificate, caste certificate: document proving that one is a member of a Scheduled Tribe or Scheduled Caste, social/economic/ethnic groups that historically were excluded and discriminated against and today receive some affirmative action programs.Ration card: document that allows some low-income households to buy grain at a reduced pricetribal: member of scheduled tribeSTD code: Subscriber trunk dialling code, part of an India phone numberDGP: Director-General of PoliceCMP: Criminal Miscellaneous PetitionSP: Superintendent of PoliceSI: Sub-inspectorIG: Inspector generalHCP: habeas corpus petitionHC: Head constableCBI: Central Bureau of InvestigationCM: Chief MinisterFIR: first information report, which begins an Indian criminal caseUntouchability: the state of being an untouchable or Dalit, the lowest caste.Aavin: state government cooperative in Tamil Nadu, selling dairy productslakhs: Hundreds of thousands (of rupees)Silapathikaaram: Tamil epic poem about the love between a husband and wifeMISA, TADA, POTA: Maintenance of Internal Security Act, Terrorism and Disruptive Activities (Prevention) Act, Prevention of Terrorism ActPanchami Land: Land which was assigned to Untouchables in 1892; much of it was taken away since then
